mapper.select: select count(*) from toy_product_inquiry where product_no = #{productNo}

SELECT inquiry_no as no, inquiry_title as title, inquiry_content as content, inquiry_reply_content as replyContent, inquiry_status as status, inquiry_created_date as createdDate, inquiry_reply_created_date as replyCreatedDate, product_no as productNo, customer_no as customerNo, customer_name as customerName, INQUIRY_SECRET_YN as secretYN FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC) RN, I.inquiry_no, I.inquiry_title, I.inquiry_content, I.inquiry_reply_content, I.inquiry_status, I.inquiry_created_date, I.inquiry_reply_created_date, I.product_no, I.customer_no, C.customer_name, I.INQUIRY_SECRET_YN FROM toy_product_inquiry I, toy_customer C WHERE I.customer_no = C.customer_no AND I.product_no = #{productNo} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginIndex} AND #{endIndex}
